name: Hat Man
description:
Hat Man - By Joseph Ferrari

Hat Man, a puzzle platformer based around collecting magic hats which will grant you powers required to navigate Hat Man's mansion. Do you have what it takes to journey through all of the basement, to reach your dinner party in time to great your guests.

Hat Man includes:

  • 40 levels in the main story
  • 5 secret bonus levels
  • 7 unique magic hats
  • An epic final boss fight!

Made by Joseph Ferrari and produced by MoonGolf Studios - www.themoongolf.com - @JosephMoonGolf
